article_title: Midlands hospitals aren’t in some new insurance provider networks
article_text: People shopping for coverage through the Affordable Care Act need to pay close attention to the provider networks, which are narrower than many private insurance plans were in the past – so narrow that some major hospitals aren’t in-network in some plans.

article_metadata.news-keywords: ACA, insurance, hospitals, networks, BlueCross, BlueChoice, Coventry
